thread.title: China vows to protect iself from U.S. trade threats

title: China vows to protect iself from U.S. trade threats
text:
China vows to protect iself from U.S. trade threats Wednesday, May 30, 2018 - 01:34
China says it will impose its own tariffs on the U.S. if Washington's renewed threat of slapping tariffs on $50 billion of goods from Beijing is followed through. Laura Frykberg reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
China says it will impose its own tariffs on the U.S. if Washington's renewed threat of slapping tariffs on $50 billion of goods from Beijing is followed through. Laura Frykberg reports. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2IZApGL
